description: Returns a list of tags that are applied to the specified OpsWorks for Chef Automate or OpsWorks for Puppet Enterprise servers or backups.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of an OpsWorks for Chef Automate or OpsWorks for Puppet Enterprise server for which you want to show applied tags. For example, arn:aws:opsworks-cm:us-west-2:123456789012:server/test-owcm-server/EXAMPLE-66b0-4196-8274-d1a2bEXAMPLE.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: Tags that have been applied to the resource.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: A tag key, such as Stage or Name. A tag key cannot be empty. The key can be a maximum of 127 characters, and can contain only Unicode letters, numbers, or separators, or the following special characters: + - = . _ : /

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: An optional tag value, such as Production or test-owcm-server. The value can be a maximum of 255 characters, and contain only Unicode letters, numbers, or separators, or the following special characters: + - = . _ : /

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A token that you can use as the value of NextToken in subsequent calls to the API to show more results.
